**Project Description:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified contractors to submit a bid to restore the runaway, taxiway, apron, roads, and parking area at the St. Anthony Airport in Newfoundland and Labrador. The project involves the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment, and materials necessary to complete the work. The contract is expected to be completed in stages over the next three years.
